trans-unit.source: Displays a push button control on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 显示按钮控件在网页上。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Button Postback Behavior and Server Events](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [Handling Button Events in Client Script](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [Button Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [Buttons in Data Controls](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [Binding Data to the Controls](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the Button control to create a push button on the Web page that lets users to post a page to the server.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [按钮回发行为和服务器事件](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [处理客户端脚本中的按钮事件](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [按钮控件和验证](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [数据控件中的按钮](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [数据绑定到控件](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [带 UpdatePanel 控件使用按钮](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍使用按钮控件使用户能够发布到服务器的页面的 Web 页面上创建推送按钮。

trans-unit.source: The control triggers an event in server code that you can handle to respond to the postback.
trans-unit.target: 控件触发可以处理以响应回发的服务器代码中的事件。

trans-unit.source: It can also raise an event in client script that you can handle before the page is posted or that can run and then cancel submission of the page.
trans-unit.target: 它还可能会引发发页面或，可以运行，并随后取消页面提交的之前可以处理的客户端脚本中的事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET includes several kinds of button controls, each of which appears differently on Web pages.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ASP.NET 包括多种类型的按钮控件，其中每个在网页以不同方式显示。

trans-unit.source: They are the Button control, which renders as a push button; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control, which renders as a link; and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control, which renders as an image; and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, which lets you create a graphic that has hotspots that users can click.
trans-unit.target: 它们是将呈现为一个下压按钮; 的按钮控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件，将呈现为链接; 与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件，将呈现为图像; 与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件，可以创建具有用户可单击的热点的图形，该控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: By default, all button controls submit the page when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有按钮控件都提交页面在单击时。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> controls to create buttons on the page that are programmable in server code.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件以创建页上的按钮是可编程的服务器代码中。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>

trans-unit.source: For details about the differences between HTML and Web server controls, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, a Button control is a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个按钮控件是一个提交按钮。

trans-unit.source: A Submit button does not have a command name (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property) associated with the button and simply posts the Web page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 提交按钮没有命令名称 (通过指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性) 与关联的按钮以及只需网页回发到服务器的文章。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>

trans-unit.source: A Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`, by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`，通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple Button controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which Button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你创建在网页上的控件的多个按钮，并以编程方式确定单击的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property with a command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>与命令按钮来提供有关要执行，如的命令的其他信息的属性`Ascending`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>时该命令按钮单击事件以编程方式控制的操作执行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>

trans-unit.source: ## Button Postback Behavior and Server Events When a user clicks any Web server control button, the page is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: # # 按钮回发行为和服务器事件当用户单击任何 Web 服务器控件按钮时，页发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This causes the Web page to be processed and any pending events to be raised in server-based code.
trans-unit.target: 这使得 Web 页后，可以处理，在基于服务器的代码中引发任何挂起的事件。

trans-unit.source: When all page and control processing has finished, the page renders itself to the browser again.
trans-unit.target: 当完成所有页面和控件处理时，页面将呈现自身到浏览器试。

trans-unit.source: The buttons can raise their own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> events or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event, which you can handle by using server-based code.
trans-unit.target: 该按钮可以引发其自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>事件，你可以通过使用基于服务器的代码处理。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>

trans-unit.source: This is different than events in traditional HTML pages or in client-based Web applications, where a button's `onclick` event is handled by using JavaScript that runs in the client.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不同于事件在基于客户端的 Web 应用程序中，或传统的 HTML 页中其中一个按钮`onclick`通过在客户端中运行的 JavaScript 事件进行处理。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When users click a button control, the page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击按钮控件时，页回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: By default, the page is posted back to itself, You can configure buttons to post the current page to another page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，页发送回其自身，您可以配置要发布到另一页的当前页的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful for creating multi-page forms.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于创建多页窗体。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Handling Button Events in Client Script Button controls can raise both server events and client events.
trans-unit.target: # # 客户端脚本按钮控件中处理按钮事件可能会发出服务器事件和客户端事件。

trans-unit.source: Server events occur after postback, and they are handled in the server-side code that you write for the page.
trans-unit.target: 服务器事件发生回发后，并且它们不为页面编写服务器端代码中处理。

trans-unit.source: Client events are handled in client script, typically ECMAScript (JavaScript), and are raised before the page is submitted.
trans-unit.target: 客户端事件会在客户端脚本，通常 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 中处理，并引发了然后提交页面。

trans-unit.source: By adding client-side events to ASP.NET button controls, you can perform tasks such as displaying confirmation dialog boxes before submitting the page, and potentially cancel the submission.
trans-unit.target: 通过将客户端事件添加到 ASP.NET 按钮控件，你可以执行任务，例如在提交页上之前, 显示确认对话框，并可能会取消提交。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Respond to Button Web Server Control Events in Client Script](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 响应客户端脚本中的按钮 Web 服务器控件事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You might also want the Button control to also use client script to perform the postback (instead of simply performing an HTTP POST operation).
trans-unit.target: 你可能要按钮控件还使用客户端脚本来执行回发 （而不是只需执行 HTTP POST 操作）。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to programmatically manipulate the postback, such as attaching it to other elements on the page.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果你想要以编程方式操作回发，如将其附加到页面上的其他元素。

trans-unit.source: You can set the Button control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.UseSubmitBehavior%2A> property to `true` to cause the Button control to use client-script based postback.
trans-unit.target: 你可以先设置按钮控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.UseSubmitBehavior%2A>属性`true`会使按钮控件用于客户端-脚本基于回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.UseSubmitBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Button Controls and Validation If a page contains ASP.NET validator controls, by default, clicking a button control causes the validator control to perform its check.
trans-unit.target: # # 按钮控件和验证如果页同时包含 ASP.NET 验证控件的默认值，单击一个按钮控件将使验证程序控件执行其检查。

trans-unit.source: If client-side validation is enabled for a validator control, the page is not submitted if a validation check has failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端验证已启用的验证程序控件，则不会提交页面，验证检查失败时。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the properties supported by button controls that enable you to control the validation process more precisely.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍了由使您能够更精确地控制验证过程的按钮控件支持的属性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>|Specifies whether clicking the button also performs a validation check.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>|指定是否单击按钮还会执行验证检查。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` to prevent a validation check.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A>|Enables you to specify which validators on the page are called when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`false`以防止验证检查。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A>|使您能够指定时单击该按钮时，将调用的页上的验证程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no validation groups are established, a button click calls all of the validators that are on the page.| For more information, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果不建立了任何验证组，单击按钮会调用所有该页上的验证。 | 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Buttons in Data Controls Button Web server controls are often used in data controls, such as in the , , and list controls.
trans-unit.target: # # 数据控件按钮 Web 服务器控件中的按钮通常用于在数据控件中，如中， ，和列表控件。

trans-unit.source: In those cases, you typically do not respond directly to the button click event.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，您通常不响应直接到按钮单击事件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, a button in a data control raises an event that is specific to the data control.
trans-unit.target: 相反，数据控件中的按钮引发事件特定于数据控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, a button might raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event instead of raising the Button control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件，一个按钮可能引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>而不是引发按钮控件的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Because data-bound list controls can contain many buttons, you can set the button's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property to specify a value to pass as part of the event.
trans-unit.target: 因为数据绑定列表控件可以包含多个按钮，你可以设置按钮的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>属性来指定要为该事件的一部分传递的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then test for this argument to see which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你随后可以测试该参数以确定被单击的按钮。

trans-unit.source: ## Binding Data to the Controls You can bind the button Web server controls to a data source in order to control their property settings dynamically.
trans-unit.target: # # 将数据绑定到控件你可以按钮 Web 服务器将控件绑定到数据源以便控制它们的属性设置动态。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set a button's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property by using data binding.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置按钮的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>通过使用数据绑定的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls Partial-page rendering makes it possible to refresh portions of a page without a postback.
trans-unit.target: # # 使用带有 UpdatePanel 控件局部页面呈现按钮使可以刷新不进行回发页面的部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls enable you to mark parts of the page that participate in partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件使你将标记为参与局部页面呈现的页的部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: By default, the behavior of controls inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, including Button controls, is to perform an asynchronous postback instead of a postback.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在控件的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，包括按钮控件将执行异步回发而不是回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: This refreshes only the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control from which the postback originates.
trans-unit.target: 这将刷新的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件从其回发的来源。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the scenario of a Button control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, you can use Button controls with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls in the following scenarios: - Defining a Button control that is outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control for that panel.
trans-unit.target: 除了以下场景︰ 按钮控件位于<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，你可以使用的按钮控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>以下方案中的控件:-定义之外的按钮控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件用作<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>该面板的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, it performs an asynchronous postback and refreshes the contents of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 单击按钮时，它执行异步回发，并刷新面板的内容。

trans-unit.source: - Defining a Button control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> for the panel.
trans-unit.target: 定义按钮控件位于<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件用作<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, it performs a postback even though it is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 当单击按钮时，它可以执行回发，即使它位于<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about partial-page rendering and using <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息局部页面呈现和使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[局部页面呈现概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Adds the attributes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control to the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 添加的特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件添加到客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击使用这属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止正在执行验证，请将这属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should set the CausesValidation property to `false` when you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A> property to post back to a different page.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 你应将这属性设置为`false`使用时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>属性回发到不同的页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should explicitly check validation when posting back to a different page.
trans-unit.target: 在显式时应该检查验证回发到不同的页。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly set to `false` for a `reset` or `clear` button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常设置为`false`为`reset`或`clear`按钮，以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果这属性的值设置为`true`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件将导致验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件是单击; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将引发单击事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control (for instance, with a Submit button).
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件 （例如，带有提交按钮）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The Command event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 命令事件引发时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以创建多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Command event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发的命令事件`BubbleEvent`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref> event along with the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传递到的可选参数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref>以及关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>事件

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandArgument property to specify a parameter that compliments the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CommandArgument 属性指定一个参数，补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can set the CommandArgument property by itself, it is normally only used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is also set.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 尽管通过本身，你可以将 CommandArgument 属性进行设置，但它是使用的时，通常情况下才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>也设置属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CommandArgument property complements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property by allowing you to provide additional information about the command to perform.
trans-unit.target: CommandArgument 属性补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性，它允许你提供有关要执行的命令的其他信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to `Sort` and the CommandArgument property to `Ascending`, you specify a command to sort in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性`Sort`而 CommandArgument 属性设为`Ascending`，指定按升序排序的命令。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An optional parameter passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref> event along with the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选参数传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref>以及关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*>事件

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的命令名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> controls on a Web page, use the CommandName property to specify or determine the command name associated with each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你具有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件在网页上，使用 CommandName 属性来指定或确定与每个关联的命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: You can set the CommandName property with any string that identifies the command to perform.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then programmatically determine the command name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control and perform the appropriate actions.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件并执行相应的操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Additional information about the command, such as `Ascending`, may be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关该命令的其他信息如`Ascending`，可通过使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The command name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 命令名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>对象，表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: The GetPostBackOptions method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: GetPostBackOptions 方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象，表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件的回发行为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object is then typically passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象通常然后传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致页回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> class.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control (for instance, with a Submit button).
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件 （例如，带有提交按钮）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时，会执行的客户端脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the OnClientClick property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OnClientClick 属性指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The client-side script that executes when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 时，会执行的客户端脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click"></xref>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以创建多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCommand 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the button has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在客户端上呈现之前单击该按钮。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 派生自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用 OnPreRender 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发送时从当前页的页 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 要从当前页时发送网页的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将导致页后，可以回发到自身。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控制当回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event, and if defined, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件，它被单击时，引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件，并定义，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件内容呈现给指定的编写器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>对象，表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控制当回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event, and if defined, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件，它被单击时，引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件，并定义，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中显示的文本标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify or determine the caption to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本属性来指定或确定要在中显示的标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中显示的文本标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。

trans-unit.source: Use the UseSubmitBehavior property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.
trans-unit.target: UseSubmitBehavior 属性用于指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: By default the value of this property is `true`, causing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to use the browser's submit mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下此属性的值是`true`，从而导致<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件以使用浏览器的提交机制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `false`, the ASP.NET page framework adds client-side script to the page to post the form to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`false`，ASP.NET 页框架会将客户端脚本添加到页后，可以窗体发布到服务器。

trans-unit.source: When the UseSubmitBehavior property is `false`, control developers can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> method to return the client postback event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 当 UseSubmitBehavior 属性是`false`，控件开发人员可以使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>方法来返回客户端回发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> method contains the text of the client-side function call and can be inserted into a client-side event handler.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>方法包含客户端函数调用的文本和可以插入到客户端事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该控件使用客户端浏览器的，提交机制;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件组的其中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ValidationGroup 属性来为其指定的验证组名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定 ValidationGroup 属性的值，只有的验证控件才是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 为其控件组的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
